artist: Artist: Nathan Oliveira; Printer: Aris Koutroulis; Printer: Tamarind Lithography Workshop, Los Angeles (now Albuquerque, N.M.); Publisher: Tamarind Lithography Workshop, Los Angeles (now Albuquerque, N.M.)

title: Homage to Carrière
